Package io.micronaut.data.model

Interface Pageable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Sort
    @Introspected
public interface Pageable
extends Sort
    Models pageable data. The from(int, int) method can be used to construct a new instance to pass to Micronaut Data methods.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    boros, graemerocher

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.micronaut.data.model.Sort

        Sort.Order

      static Pageable UNPAGED
      Constant for no pagination.

      • Fields inherited from interface io.micronaut.data.model.Sort

        UNSORTED
